p: Herbal macerates are primarily used in cosmetics so far, and the oils used for their preparation are popular edible vegetable oils, most often rapeseed and sunflower oil. It is worth mentioning that before adding the herbal material, the oil is usually heated [ 45, 46], which may result in the loss of valuable properties. Moreover, specialist literature lacks detailed information on the selection of base oils for particular herbal plant species, and above all, there is no analysis of the fatty acid composition and antioxidant content in macerates as compared to the raw materials.
